head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BARSEL, ADAM BRETT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BARSEL, ADAM BRETT

block.p: BARSEL-Adam Brett. On October 28, 2000. Beloved son of Richard and Rhonda Barsel. Brother of Allison and Lori Barsel. Cherished grandson of Jean and Harvey Good, and Ely and Janet Barsel. Beloved grandson of the late Adele Barsel. Adored nephew of Jeffrey and Pam Good, Bonnie and Barry Ivler, Debbie Barsel and Barbara Good Aal. Loving cousin of Nikki, Jason and Melissa Good, and Ilysa Ivler. Contributions in memory of Adam may be made to the Adam Brett Barsel Memorial Fund, Hewlett School District, or to the Lawrence School District Scholarship Fund.

BARSEL-Adam. Our family of friends will forever miss our beloved boy with a mischievous smile. The memory of your delicious hugs will stay with us always. Though our walk together was tragically cut short, each step is eternally etched on our hearts. The Epsteins, The Roshevskys, The Siegels
BARSEL-Adam. Our deepest sympathies to Ely and Jan Barsel and their entire family on the loss of Adam. Harvey and Arlene Blau
